message:
A #review about  #Ember #knockout #Backbone #Vue #react in comparison to #angular1 and #angular2
=================================
Knockout, Backbone
Both get the work done, but they are outdated solutions compared to angular n Vuejs.
=================================
Ember
modern framework, has a lovely CLI, a lot better than the previous ones, but, we didn't click, so moving on :D
=================================
Vuejs
i loved it, a 16kb framework that accomplishes everything u need in a frontend framework with the best declarative approaches, it's so simple, u can learn it in 2 hour max. it felt like a mix between the good stuff in angular 1 n angular2... it's a lot better than angular1 and it has a lovely debugging tool!
I would use it for websites and small webapps, yet, not as powerful as angular2 of course!
=================================
React
WTFFFFFFFFFFFF, it's freaking ugly, if there's an election between react and angular2, elderly people will elect React, that's how i feel about it :D
=================================
angular1.x
it's has been 6 years, thank u for ur services, i would say it's gonna be around for more 4 years, i wouldn't build any new apps with it unless it's a low budget or short-term project!
=================================
angular2
way more futuristic than all of them, it's the best ecosystem for you as a developer and the best output for your users, i'm totally investing my next few months mastering it!
